title: Mix master mix last and spin briefly
body: Prepare master mix on ice, mix gently 5 times, pulse spin, then aliquot into tubes

title: Primer final concentration
body: If primer final concentration is above 0.8 µM, non-specific bands may increase.

title: Volume mismatch
body: If water volume is negative, reduce primer or probe volumes, or increase reaction volume.

title: MW requirement for mass conversion
body: Mass units need molecular weight. Enter MW if converting mg/mL to molar target.

title: Use reverse pipetting for small volumes
body: Use reverse pipetting when transfer is small (<1 µL), then mix 10 times.

title: Use 2-step dilution above 1,000x
body: For large dilution factors, prefer 2-step dilution to reduce pipetting error.

title: Check insert purity before ligation
body: Unpurified insert often causes low transformation efficiency.

title: Approximation caution
body: This is an approximation; use fluorescent quantification when accuracy is required.

title: Avoid edge wells
body: Use edge-well fill controls because evaporation can increase concentration near edges.

title: Border cell handling
body: Count border cells consistently with your group to reduce bias.
